tgt_translated: 午餐 后 见面 lah ...

src: Wth ok i chilling out with family at macs they can sign

silver_src: Wth ok lar, I **i** am **chilling out** at **Macs**, **family** can sign **lah**

src: Haha I got two exams on one day times two sia... but means finish fast!
tgt_translated: 哈哈 我 有 一天 两场 考试 两次 说完 ！
baseline_src: Haha, Got two exams on one day lah, times two leh sia... but meh worry, just finish fast hor!
silver_src: Haha got one exam on one day times two sia la, but meh means finish fast, I just need to push through leh!

tgt_translated: 提交 实体 材料 。
baseline_src: Submit hardcopy lah, submit paper copy punya.

src: Haha I tmr confirm with u again.
tgt_translated: 哈哈 ， 明天 我 再 确认 一次 。

src: Dear ah.. dun wake up so early. I set my alarm clock. Love usweety.!!
tgt_translated: 亲爱 的 啊 … 不要 早起 了 。 我 的 闹钟 已经 设置 了 。 我们 甜蜜 的 爱 ！ ！
baseline_src: 亲爱的，别早起 lar lar leh! Set alarm clock la, love you sweetie!!
silver_src: Dear ah, dun wake up so early leh, I set my alarm clock lor, Love usweety!!

src: If u can, wait. Or change 2 a dr who comes 2moro at 5 or 6.
tgt_translated: 如果 可以 ， 等待 。 或 改为 明天 5 或 6 点来 见 医生 。
baseline_src: 若可以, wait ah. Or change to doctor who come tomorrow at 5 or 6 lah.
silver_src: If u can, wait lah. Alternatively, change plan to meet dr who comes tomorrow at 5 or 6 hor.

src: Hi, ulu pandan needs more blue claim forms. Thanks.
tgt_translated: 问候 ， 乌鲁 潘丹 需要 更 多 的 蓝色 申报表 。 谢谢 。
baseline_src: Ni hao, ulu pandan need more blue claim form la, thank you very much ah.
silver_src: Hai, Ulu Pandan need more blue claim form la, thank you very much.
